captions.text: So... did you see the new trailer?
Yes!  I watched it like a thousand times!
Awesome is not even enough to describe.
I mean with the music and the voice over...
And when Han and Chewy came out...
I'm not talking about the Star Wars trailer!
Why not?  Are you talking about Jurassic World?
I think you were trying to sound like Ultron.
You totally are with that robot voice!
There's nothing wrong with my robot voice!
I mean you might as well have said...
I'm going to tear you apart from the inside!
I asked, "Do you bleed?"  That's totally different.
Whatever.  Well the answer is yes...
Because everyone saw me bleed in Superman 2.
But now I'm gonna make you bleed.
Oh well I hope that makes you feel better.
Because you know what you really should be hoping for?
That Han and Chewy actually make it through the first act of episode 7
Because I have a bad feeling about this.
You're a bad feelings about this!
It means I'm always right... Because I..
Well maybe you shouldn't make your catchphrase so easy to see coming!
Well maybe you should watch your back.
Or else I'll make a bunch of gadgets, and teach you a lesson!
Well that sounds like I'll learn something, and become better than I was in the first place!
Well thanks for making me more amazing!
I hate you so much right now!
The star wars trailer is better dude!
I am SO gonna fight you!
Dude, I will hug you to your grave!
Yes I will!  We are FRIENDS!
No we aren't!  You're too dangerous!
Okay detective!  That makes perfect sense!
We're done here!  From here on out, it's on!
Okay but can we still have coffee?  Because I enjoy our little talks.

title: Super Cafe: Batman v Superman - It's On!

comments.author: Thidas Geesara

comments.text:
For those believing that Batman is like Iron Man, it's not, he wears it 
because, it is a special armour that needs to be worn and an important 
occasion, cause, Superman has turned up in Gotham city. Batman only wears 
it when absolute necessary. It's Kryptonian tech armour suit to battle 
aliens as such. I really don't understand why some people keep saying that 
Star Wars trailer is better, though, it was good as well. I like both 
movies and we all know that the Star Wars prequel were dire and atrocious. 
Both movies will rock the world on its own merits, totally different type 
of movies and people should stop comparing two iconic movies and trying to 
find flaws in it. We need to cease reasons to dislike a section of the 
trailer or Batman's suit isn't right or it looks like Iron Man, etc, these 
are thoughts we begin in our minds, trying to find a reason to complain. 
"They say it begins with a fever, the rage and the feeling of powerlessness 
that turns good men cruel." We are cruel if you hate something that you 
don't comprehend fully and why it's occurring in the movie? Mere 
conjectures of how bad trailer looks is purely a figment of our imagination 
and doesn't warrant reasons to hate it. The trailer was beautiful, and 
dialogue in the trailer was smart and cool. If I love one movie trailer 
does it mean I dislike the other, no, I like a movie because, I'm pragmatic 
and judge it objectively and not malign it before it hits our theaters next 
year. I have no doubt whatsoever about the outcome of this movie and Star 
Wars, both titan movies have been made with precision, because, these type 
of movie deserves time to be created into a masterpiece, which I believe so 
it has.﻿

for the AOU hishe you need to have this scene please.
-
*hawkeye looks up after being saved by quicksilver to see him standing 
before him completely fine.*
Hawkeye: Huh? you... you're... you didn't get shot?
Quicksilver: Um, no?
Hawkeye: But... how?!
Quicksilver: Dude, I'm like super fast... I'll I had to do was dodge the 
bullets. I mean earlier I dodged Thors freaking hammer!
Hawkeye: Wow I never thought of tha- HEY LOOK BEHIND YOU!
*quicksilver looks behind him whilst Hawkeye aims his bow towards 
quicksilvers head, quicksilver looks back at him quickly*
Quicksilver: what are you doing?!

Hawkeye: yes
